key_risks: Declining user base and revenue challenges
Intense competition from larger e-commerce platforms
controversies: Past controversies around refund policies and customer service
Merchant dissatisfaction with Groupon's business model
social_issues: Consumer trust issues due to past controversies
Merchant concerns over fees and customer retention
governance_issues: Dilution concerns from the oversubscribed rights offering
